description: Customer support platform integration for authentication, billing, and device management

verify_user.description: Verify user account exists and is active
verify_user.returns: user verification status and account details
verify_user.notes: Accepts either username or email for lookup

send_reset_link.description: Send password reset link via email or SMS
send_reset_link.returns: confirmation that reset link was sent

unlock_account.description: Unlock account that was locked due to failed attempts or suspicious activity
unlock_account.returns: unlock status and any security notes
unlock_account.notes: May require additional verification for suspicious activity locks

check_2fa_status.description: Check if two-factor authentication is enabled for account

get_invoices.returns: list of invoices with dates, amounts, and status
get_invoices.notes: Returns last 12 months of invoices by default

get_plan.returns: plan name, price, features, renewal date

process_refund.notes: Refunds typically process within 5-7 business days

check_status.description: Check platform service status for device type
check_status.returns: service status (operational, degraded, outage) and any known issues
check_status.notes: Device types: ios, android, web, desktop

restart_service.description: Restart backend services for user session
restart_service.returns: restart confirmation and new session ID

check_connectivity.description: Test network connectivity and API reachability
check_connectivity.returns: connectivity test results and recommended actions
